cancel_subscription_modal.headline: Are you sure?
cancel_subscription_modal.main_message:
Your monthly subscription is paid through the end of your billing period. If you would like to proceed with cancelling your subscription at the end of the period, please click "Yes, Continue" below to go to the next screen.

When you cancel your subscription you will lose all access to your account, including:

cancel_subscription_modal_screen2.headline:
We're sorry to see
you go!
cancel_subscription_modal_screen2.main_message: Your feedback is valuable! Please take a moment to tell us the reason you cancelled and any other thoughts.
cancel_subscription_modal_screen2.notice_alert: Your subscription is cancelled. After April 30, 2023 it will no longer be active.

remove_payment_modal.message: Are you sure you want to delete this payment method?

text.agree_to_term_msg: By clicking Pay and Upgrade, you agree to the below policies.
text.authorize_cc_msg: I authorize RapidFunnel Inc. to charge my account for this amount.
text.paypal_msg: By choosing to pay with "PayPal", you will be directed outside of this page, where an additional privacy policy and terms of use will apply.
text.yearly_benefit_msg: Two months FREE by paying yearly!
